properties.rdfs:comment: The airport where the flight terminates.
properties.rdfs:label: arrivalAirport

properties.rdfs:comment: Identifier of the flight's arrival gate.
properties.rdfs:label: arrivalGate

properties.rdfs:comment: The unique identifier for a flight including the airline IATA code. For example, if describing United flight 110, where the IATA code for United is 'UA', the flightNumber is 'UA110'.
properties.rdfs:label: flightNumber

properties.rdfs:comment: The time when a passenger can check into the flight online.
properties.rdfs:label: webCheckinTime

properties.rdfs:comment: Description of the meals that will be provided or available for purchase.
properties.rdfs:label: mealService

properties.rdfs:comment: Identifier of the flight's departure gate.
properties.rdfs:label: departureGate

properties.rdfs:comment: Identifier of the flight's departure terminal.
properties.rdfs:label: departureTerminal

properties.rdfs:comment: The estimated time the flight will take.
properties.rdfs:label: estimatedFlightDuration

properties.rdfs:comment: Identifier of the flight's arrival terminal.
properties.rdfs:label: arrivalTerminal

properties.rdfs:comment: The airport where the flight originates.
properties.rdfs:label: departureAirport
